verbs.description: [ARG0: The New York Times] [V: reported] [ARG1: that President Trump knew about Michael Cohen ’s payment to Stormy Daniels for months before he denied any knowledge to reporters] .

The New York Times reported that [ARG0: President Trump] [V: knew] [ARG1: about Michael Cohen ’s payment to Stormy Daniels] [ARGM-TMP: for months] [ARGM-TMP: before he denied any knowledge to reporters] .
The New York Times reported that President Trump knew about Michael Cohen ’s payment to Stormy Daniels for months before [ARG0: he] [V: denied] [ARG1: any knowledge] [ARG2: to reporters] .
